name: Wrong Room
description:
Wrong Room

You've lost your memories, you don't know where you are, you need to escape from this neverending loop of rooms.

Solve the puzzle to get out.

Controls

Move with WASD

Shift to Sprint

Press 'E' to interact with objects

If you have performance issues, try the Windows Build!

Thanks
